text: In 28 years of teaching, Deloris Fowler has taught through a number of disappointing education reforms. But she's driven to show students the joy in reading‚Äîregardless of the curriculum, writes @natwexler: https://t.co/YKMn2MRcQK

text: A bulk carrier ship, loaded with about 4,000 tons of fuel oil, ran aground off the coast of Mauritius on July 25. Mauritius has declared a ‚Äústate of environmental emergency,‚Äù as the growing spill threatens nearby reefs and lagoons. Via @TheAtlPhoto: https://t.co/fxp4qHodd2 https://t.co/vDPGF7HK4i
